Search for a term

get_searchTerm.Rd

get_searchTerm("[searchTerm]") returns documents, comments, or dockets filtered by specific term

Usage

get_searchTerm(searchTerm, documents, lastModifiedDate, api_keys)

Arguments

searchTerm

Term to filter by.

documents

Object to return. Default is set to documents.

Valid options are documents, comments, or dockets.

lastModifiedDate

Filter results by their last modified date. Default is set to Sys.time().

User-specified values must be formatted as yyyy-MM-dd%20HH:mm:ss.

api_keys

API key(s) from api.data.gov.

Details

Value

References

Author

Note

See also

##---- Should be DIRECTLY executable !! ----
##-- ==>  Define data, use random,
##--  or do  help(data=index)  for the standard data sets.
